CustomField.description: If checked, sales data will not sync. This will help avoid unnecessary data traffic between mobile and online. Appears on Hospital, Institution, Pharmacy, Wholesaler, and HCP page layouts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, sales data will not sync. This will help avoid unnecessary data traffic between mobile and online. Appears on Hospital, Institution, Pharmacy, Wholesaler, and HCP page layouts.
CustomField.label: Do Not Sync Sales Data
